label: Having difficulty finding CloudShell?
description: If you're stuck on this challenge, click on the Activate Hint button to get some guidance on how to do all of the things.
value: Ensure that you have navigated to your team's AWS Console. Then click on 'Services' in the upper left and find 'CloudShell' under 'Developer Tools'

label: Are you having difficulty finding the IAM role name?
description: If you're stuck on this challenge, click on the Activate Hint button to learn one way to solve it (there are many!)
value: In your CloudShell console, try typing 'aws sts get-caller-identity'. Find the name between the slashes after 'assumed-role', for example if you see  arn:aws:sts::<account number>:assumed-role/<RoleName>/MasterKey, the answer is <RoleName>

label: Are you having difficulty finding the Parameter value?
description: If you're stuck on this challenge, click on the Activate Hint button to learn one way to solve it (there are many!)
value: In your CloudShell console, try typing 'aws ssm get-parameter --name /GameDay/IcebreakerParameter'. Find the 'Value' field for the answer!'
